If you do not agree with any part of these T&Cs, you are not authorized to access, use, or participate in Axion leagues or any related services. These T&Cs constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Axion, detailing your rights, obligations, and responsibilities. Please read them carefully to ensure you fully understand the terms of engagement and the legal implications of your participation.
participation_eligibility_description:
To participate in Axion leagues and services, you must meet all of the following eligibility criteria:

**2.1. Legal Age**: You must be of legal age in your jurisdiction, meaning you are legally capable of entering into binding agreements. This ensures that you have the legal capacity to understand and accept these T&Cs.

**2.2. Agreement to T&Cs**: You must explicitly agree to and comply with these T&Cs. Your participation in any Axion league signifies your acceptance of these terms and your commitment to adhere to them throughout your engagement with Axion. If you do not agree to any part of these T&Cs, you must not participate in Axion leagues.

**2.3. Compliance with Laws**: You must comply with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction. This includes but is not limited to financial, privacy, and anti-money laundering regulations. Non-compliance may result in the termination of your participation in Axion leagues and potential legal consequences.
league_mechanics_description:
**3.1. Zero-Loss Model**: Participating in Axion leagues involves buying a league ticket, which can be refunded at the end of the league. This provides a zero-loss experience for all Users.

**3.2. Prize Funding**: The prize pool for Axion leagues is generated through the interest accrued on the purchased league ticket, which are temporarily lent out via Kujira’s DeFi products. This ensures that the league ticket amount  remains intact while providing the potential for additional rewards.

**3.3. Point Accumulation**: Users earn points by actively engaging with designated protocols defined by the league.

**3.4. Winner Determination**: At the end of the league period, the Users with the highest points will be declared the winner and receive the prize.
fees_description: Axion reserves the right to apply a fee to the total prize pool of any leagues iit organizes. This fee, which may vary depending on the nature and scope of the league, will be deducted from the overall prize pool prior to distribution to the winners.
